description: Built for the trails, with a look that suits the city streets, the Yose winter boots are ready for the coldest weather. Thick insulation and a waterproof construction protect feet from winter's worst, with a gusseted tongue to keep you dry in deep snowdrifts.Durable leather with a waterproof membrane bootie.200g DryTech synthetic insulation keeps feet toasty.Wicking synthetic liner with 7mm wool and lyocell insole for warmth.Lightweight Treadlite by UGG™ midsole cushions underfoot.White Spider Rubber outsole grips to icy surfaces.Manufacturer's active temperature rating of -32C.
name: UGG Yose Waterproof Winter Boots - Women's
